tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Good.. Dr and his secretary are very kind enough to receive/treat the patients. The reception and the treatment area are very clean and tidy. Dr. LN is very friendly, has an helping attitude for his patients. He is a good, upcoming doctor. 

Thanks 
Ashok

tags: None
review:
we waited for an hour before we could see the doctor. I think the reception could be more precise. 

The billing, support from wheel chairperson, and doctors team - were very unhelpful. They needbmotebtraining, need to be organised and communicate clearly. 

After tests, i had no idea who to contact.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
The doctor listened to my description of the problem. 
Conducted test.  Explained the nature of my problem and explained about the treatment. 
He is courteous,  listening and responding.

tags: None
review: This doctor is saying that urinary infection is cured even without looking at the report. Actually after his treatment, infection has become even worse. I consulted him in Ann hospital which is even more worse

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******** ** *** **** ******** *** ******* **** ** ********* All the doctors are answered properly and patiently to the questions raised by the attenders. Staffs are also so helpful to the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very nice doctor. Clarified all our doubts. Satisfactory explanation given. Very much friendly. Worth
